1. Make sure the status bar shortcut is enabled under "Shortcut preferences".
2. To start InvisiBright, pull down your status bar while using any application and select the InvisiBright shortcut.
3. If you are using Tilt Mode, tilt your phone forward to increase brightness or back to decrease brightness.
4. If you are using Touch Mode, drag your finger up and down across the right side of the screen to adjust brightness.
5. Quit either mode with the back key or a tap on the screen (on the left side for Touch Mode).
6. Email dan.girsh@gmail.com with questions or comments.
